mapper.insert: INSERT INTO operate_log (item_id, modify_num,operate,operate_user_id, operate_time) VALUE ( #{itemId}, #{modifyNum}, #{operate}, #{operateUserId}, #{operateTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT o.id AS id, u.title AS title, o.operate AS operate, o.modify_num AS modifyNum, u.userName AS userName, o.operate_time AS operateTime FROM operate_log o LEFT JOIN tb_item t ON o.item_id = t.id LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON o.operate_user_id = u.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.id = #{itemId} ORDER BY operateTime desc limit #{start, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{end, jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT * from operate_log where id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: UPDATE operate_log SET num = num + #{num} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM operate_log WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
